tagblock.name: Runtime
tagblock.comment: Strings print to the stringid "chud_survival_objective_text" so be sure to reference that somewhere in the biped HUD or remove states on the original "survival_state" widget so it always shows. Also, variables like #effect_player are no longer recognized by the engine so you'll need to work around them. And medals don't display because "chud_survival_objective_text" doesn't support them.

tagblock.name: Multiplayer Constants
tagblock.comment: This is a tight cylinder around the player with a strong negative weight. It serves to protect players from spawning close to an enemy, or having and enemy spawn close to them.

This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak negative weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players away from spawning near enemies, or in enemy held areas.

This is a larger cylinder, with a size set specifically for the size of the map. It has a weak positive weight which falls to zero towards the outer radius. It serves to bias players towards spawning with allies, or in areas which are controlled by friendly players.
Same as ALLY BIAS, but used when the ally is selected in the dead-camera.
Dead teammate influences are cylinders centered upon the body of a dead teammate (or the player's own dead body).

tagblock.name: Weapon Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by weapons either weilded or carried in the player's backpack

tagblock.name: Vehicle Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by vehicles.

tagblock.name: Projectile Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by projectiles.

tagblock.name: Equipment Influencers
tagblock.tooltip: These influencers are induced by equipment.

float32.name: Vehicle Nearby Player Distance
float32.tooltip: how nearby a player is to count a vehicle as 'occupied'
